Summary: Amber light in NE moves rapidly accross sky and disappears.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were 6 other sightings in Phoenix on or around February 26th 2009
divs: sighting details19:15 mst-az 2\26 outside in the nw above the mountains amber colored light appears. in less than 2 minutes the object moves rapidly across horizon and finally disappears in the ne over the mountains. observed through binoculars almost appeared to like a hot air balloon. was moving faster than all other planes in the air. could not have been a hot air balloon like would have been intermittent like a camp fire, plus high rate of speed. my wife also observed the object, and was unable to view it with binoculars because it disappeared before she could get the binoculars on the object.
